title: FAQs
text: FAQs - Why stay at the Chateau Hotel? The Chateau Hotel offers a classic French Quarter experience near historic attractions like Café du Monde and Jackson Square. Explore the historic landmarks on New Orleans’ Decatur Street and savor beignets at Café du Monde, all just steps from our lobby. Hotel accommodations include luxury in-room amenities, a courtyard pool, and self-parking. - What amenities do you offer? Our hotel offers 24-hour front desk service, self-parking, French Quarter balconies, a European-style courtyard, and a serene pool. In addition, enjoy modern amenities like complimentary Wi-Fi, bottled water at the front desk, flat-screen televisions, hair dryers, clothing irons, ironing boards, and prime service from our friendly hotel staff. - Do you have rooms overlooking the French Quarter? Yes, the Chateau Hotel has rooms and suites with iconic French Quarter balcony views. In contrast, hotel rooms and suites without balconies feature large windows overlooking Decatur Street. - Is public transportation nearby? Yes! The New Orleans streetcar stops two blocks from our hotel’s rooms and suites. Exploring the hectic French Quarter is easy at the Chateau Hotel. - Do you offer on-site parking? We offer secured self-parking on St. Phillip Street to guests for $45 plus tax, a rare and valuable amenity in the French Quarter. - Is there a courtyard pool? Our hotel has a serene courtyard pool and lounge area. Relax poolside and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere before enjoying a rowdy night on Bourbon St. - How far away is the hotel from St. Louis Cathedral? The iconic St. Louis Cathedral is only a five minute walk from our hotel. - What is there to do in the French Quarter? Filled with history and culture, the attractions are endless in the French Quarter. Discover the birthplace of Jazz at the New Orleans Jazz Museum or bar hop along Bourbon St. In NOLA, the good times never stop rolling. - Is the hotel corporate-friendly? Yes, our hotel is corporate-friendly. Chateau Hotel offers all the accommodations business travelers need during their stay in the French Quarter. Our hotel provides self-parking and is near the New Orleans Ernest N. Morial Convention Center, making it a convenient choice for business guests. - Does the hotel have elevators? Our historic boutique hotel spans three floors of charm and character. While we don’t have an elevator, the journey to your room is part of the authentic New Orleans experience, offering a chance to admire the details that make our property unique. Plus, it’s a great way to stay active while indulging in all the incredible cuisine the city has to offer! - Why doesn't the hotel have elevators? Most buildings in the French Quarter were built in a historical period when elevator shafts were not permitted due to the narrow building footprints, structural limitations, and the desire to preserve the historic architecture. Adding an elevator shaft would significantly alter the exterior of the building which is not permitted due to strict preservation guidelines.
